item.title: Setup SonarQube Project
item.description: Setup This guide assumes you have a GoCd Pipeline already setup and a sonar-project.properties file pre-configured in your package root. If you don’t have a pipeline, Setup a Pipeline. If you don’t have a sonar-project.properties file, use this template to commit one: # must be unique in a given SonarQube instance sonar.projectKey=<PROJECT_KEY> # Path is relative to the sonar-project.properties file. Defaults to . sonar.sources=<SOURCE> # URL to sonar host sonar.host.url=http://sonar.agiledefense.lab Where <PROJECT_KEY> is the project key associated with your SonarQube project and <SOURCE> is the source directory where all your project code resides.
